---
title: HelixDB Guide
last_updated: 2025-10-24
audience: LLM agents
canonical: https://docs.helix-db.com
---

# Documentation

- [HelixDB Overview](https://helix-llms-txt.mintlify.app/overview.txt): Introduction to HelixDB, its features, and its use cases.
- [Installation](https://helix-llms-txt.mintlify.app/installation.txt): Prerequisites, installation steps, and best practices.
- [HelixDB CLI](https://helix-llms-txt.mintlify.app/cli.txt): CLI commands, project configurations, common workflows, and troubleshooting.
- [HelixDB SDKs](https://helix-llms-txt.mintlify.app/sdks.txt): SDKs for Python, TypeScript, Rust, and Go.
- [HelixDB Query Language Introduction](https://helix-llms-txt.mintlify.app/hql-intro.txt): Helix Query Language components, syntax, and types. Schema definition and rules.
- [CRUD Operations](https://helix-llms-txt.mintlify.app/crud-operations.txt): HQL for creating, reading, updating, and deleting nodes, edges, and vectors.
- [Graph Traversals](https://helix-llms-txt.mintlify.app/traversals.txt): HQL for traversing in and out of nodes, vectors, and edges.
- [Result Operations](https://helix-llms-txt.mintlify.app/result.txt): HQL for operating on traversal results.
- [Properties Operations](https://helix-llms-txt.mintlify.app/properties.txt): HQL for operating on properties of nodes, edges, and vectors.
- [Return Values](https://helix-llms-txt.mintlify.app/return.txt): Return values, rules, and formatting for HQL queries.
- [Conditionals](https://helix-llms-txt.mintlify.app/conditionals.txt): HQL for filtering traversal results with conditionals.
- [Vector Operations](https://helix-llms-txt.mintlify.app/vector.txt): HQL for vector operations.
- [Keyword Search](https://helix-llms-txt.mintlify.app/keyword.txt): HQL for keyword/BM25 search operations.
- [Rerankers](https://helix-llms-txt.mintlify.app/rerankers.txt): HQL for reranking search results.
- [Aggregation](https://helix-llms-txt.mintlify.app/aggregation.txt): HQL for aggregating search results.
- [Macros](https://helix-llms-txt.mintlify.app/macros.txt): HQL macros (MCP endpoints) for custom queries.
- [Shortest Path Algorithms](https://helix-llms-txt.mintlify.app/shortest-path.txt): HQL for shortest path algorithms.
- [HQL Errors](https://helix-llms-txt.mintlify.app/errors.txt): HQL error types and handling.
